pr_title: [RW-4386][risk=low] Set correct billing status after updating a workspace's billing account

timeline.message: Merge branch 'master' of github.com:all-of-us/workbench into songe/RW-4386
show user a specific error message. recheck banner state on workspace reload

timeline.bodyText: [nit] May be marginally more readable to replace orElse(false) with isPresent()
timeline.author: gjuggler

replies.bodyText:
That's actually a different statement since isPresent() would return true if isOpen is set to false.
But probably not a good sign if that's not clear so I refactored it a little bit by pulling out a variable.
replies.author: ericsong

timeline.bodyText: I'm just sad for whoever (at Google?) decided that "Cloudbilling" shouldn't have a capital "B"... 🙄
timeline.author: gjuggler

timeline.bodyText: [opt] I tend to try to avoid abbreviations for var names in Java, though they're prevalent enough in our codebase I wouldn't block on this.
timeline.author: gjuggler
